items.encryption: Secure data transmission with SSL/TLS encryption

items.deletion: Right to delete data ("right to be forgotten")

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: OWL Platform operates in compliance with Turkish Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK) No. 6698 and European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
compliance.responsibility: As data controller, we process and protect your personal data within legal framework.

footer.note: This privacy policy may be updated as the platform evolves. Important changes will be notified via email.

items.compliance: Comply with laws and platform rules

prohibited.title: Prohibited Behavior
prohibited.description: The following behaviors are strictly prohibited on the platform:

contentRights.title: Content Rights
contentRights.userContent: You own the copyright to content you share on the platform. However, you grant OWL Platform the necessary license to use, display, and share this content on the platform.
contentRights.platformContent: All trademarks, logos, and content on the platform are property of OWL Platform.

footer.important: These terms may be updated without prior notice. Important changes will be announced on the platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about OWL Platform

whatIsOwl.question: What is OWL Platform?
whatIsOwl.answer: OWL Platform is a next-generation academic social platform that enables students to share study notes, create AI-powered content, and learn together.

whenLaunch.question: When will the platform launch?
whenLaunch.answer: The platform is currently in development. Our launch is coming soon. Join the waitlist to be among the first to know.

pricing.question: How much does it cost?
pricing.answer: OWL Platform will be free for students. Affordable premium plans will be available for advanced features. Early registrants will receive special discounts.

aiFeatures.question: How do AI features work?
aiFeatures.answer: Our AI system automatically generates flashcards, summaries, and Q&A sets from your documents. It uses Gemini AI to produce high-quality educational content.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecurity.answer: Yes! We protect your data in compliance with KVKK and GDPR standards. We implement SSL encryption, secure storage, and regular security audits.

fileFormats.question: What file formats do you support?
fileFormats.answer: We support PDF, Word (DOCX), PowerPoint (PPTX), text files, and images. Our AI system can automatically extract content from these files.

studyGroups.question: How do I create study groups?
studyGroups.answer: Once the platform is active, you'll be able to easily create groups with classmates, share notes, and collaborate together.

mobileApp.question: Is there a mobile app?
mobileApp.answer: We're currently working on the web platform. Mobile apps are in our future plans.

contentSharing.question: How can I share my content?
contentSharing.answer: You'll be able to share your notes and study materials with communities or private groups. Privacy control is entirely yours.

support.question: How can I get support?
support.answer: You can reach us at mehmet.apaydin0@outlook.com. We'll also offer live support once the platform is active.
